price: 18. (Maryam) alobaki: Ya soló, ngai na mibateli epai ya Ar-Rahmân(1) тропа yo, soki penza ozali moyengebeni.
arabic: قَالَتۡ إِنِّيٓ أَعُوذُ بِٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ مِنكَ إِن كُنتَ تَقِيّٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: qālat innī aʿūdhu bil-raḥmāni minka in kunta taqiyyan
